sentences: Heo Kyung-hwan (Korean: 허경환; born February 16, 1981), is a South Korean comedian.
He debuted as a comedian on Gag Concert, and is best known for his acts 'Four Men', 'Seoul Mate', and 'Dignity of a Beggar'.
He is also known for the shows The Human Condition and Mamma Mia.
It was revealed that he signed a contract with Cube Entertainment on 4 February 2016.
In February 2022, Heo signed with Think Entertainment.
